translations: n.调音；起音，定音；音调；（电子或收音机）调谐；协调一致

phrs.translation: 调谐范围；党范围；蝶范围

sentences.sentence: Others were quietly tuning up their instruments.
sentences.translation: 其他人正安静地为他们的乐器调音。

sentences.sentence: Auto-tuning VHF receivers are now common in cars.
sentences.translation: 自动调谐的超高频信号接收器现普遍使用在小汽车上。

sentences.sentence: The system is set up but it needs some fine-tuning.
sentences.translation: 该系统已装配好，但需要一些细小调整。
